availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: Private Squire Stinson of Company A, 17th Ky vols Inf is hereby discharged the serivce of the State of Kentucky, said discharged to be as of the date December 31st 1862, he never having been mustered into the service of the United States.
This discharge to be a waiver of all claims for Pay, bounty &c as to said Squire Stinson for service rendered.

By order of the Governor,
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
